text: Open source Python project to contribute to
Until recently, I was a Linux Administrator for a company which went out of business.
I don't need money so I don't plan to work for a while.
With all this free time, I'd like to work on my programming skills.
Of all the languages I am familiar with I have the most experience with Python.
I've searched projects on Github and Sourceforge and have sent a few emails with either no response or a very poor one.
Can anyone recommend an open source project, preferably in Python that I can contribute to?
Even if it's just as a tester or something.
I'm not a rockstar developer by any means but I am certain I can be of use to someone's project.
